page.title: 18Clubs - Mattingley Area.
page.content: A branch of the{Womens Institute}meets in its own hut in Mattingley regularly.{Cubs & Scouts}also have meetings in Mattingley but Brownies & Guides have to go to towns outside the block. There is the occasional{Church {Fete}at Mattingley, but{no village {events}at Mattingley, Dipley, West Green or Hazeley Bottom. They are very much 'dormitory' hamlets & the {youngsters go to nearby towns for {their social life}& entertainment or to attend various clubs. The{mobile library}makes 5 stops within the block once a fortnight on a Thursday. The van comes from Fleet & calls at West Green for half an hour, Dipley ( 2 stops totalling half an hour), a ten minute stop for its three readers at Hazeley Bottom & another 10 minute stop at Mattingley Church.
